content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I hope you find the apartment to your liking. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. What figure did you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. The apartment seems very nice, and I believe it would be a good place for me to live. Regarding the rental price, I was hoping for something around 600 Euros per month, all-inclusive. Is this within the range of what you are offering?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Hassan. 600 Euros per month is certainly a fair price. However, considering the location and the amenities of the apartment, I was thinking more along the lines of 650 Euros per month. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for considering my offer, Mister Heine. 650 Euros per month is a bit higher than I had hoped, but I understand that the location and amenities are important. Could we maybe find a middle ground? Perhaps 625 Euros per month? This would be all-inclusive, correct?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hassan, you are a wise negotiator. 625 Euros per month is a fair compromise. Yes, this would be all-inclusive, covering all utilities and amenities. I agree to the price of 625 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
